item.title: Dealing with the unknown
item.description: I've spent some hard months dealing with things that were way out of my comfort zone. I would usually agree that you should always aim to do things out of your comfort zone, but the ROI tends to diminish the further away from your comfort zone you are. In any case, I was slow to make progress, but I did not give up. I have this personal theory that ALL successful projects and learnings are from no ...

item.title: GitHub Copilot in Visual Studio 2022 - Visual Studio Blog
item.description: GitHub Copilot uses OpenAI Codex to suggest code and entire functions in real-time right from your editor.
